com.flowpowered.react.constraint

Class HingeJoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.Joint
      • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.HingeJoint

  • public class HingeJoint
extends Joint
    This class represents a hinge joint that allows arbitrary rotation between two bodies around a single axis. This joint has one degree of freedom. It can be useful to simulate doors or pendulums.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HingeJoint.HingeJointInfo
      This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a hinge joint.
